useCase.name: User interacts with Acadsync Application
useCase.description: User opens the Acadsync Application to perform various tasks related to academic activities.

mainSequence.step: Browser sends HTTP Request to Web Server
Web Server forwards the request to Django Application
Django Application calls the appropriate view
View queries/updates data in the Database
Database returns the data to the View
View renders the template with the retrieved data
Django Application returns the response to Web Server
Web Server sends the HTTP response to Browser
Browser displays the response to the User
